name: Combined data spreadsheets
text: The quality-controlled ARMS-MBON metadata for all events to the current date, being the first port-of-call for the general user of ARMS-MBON data: observatory, sampling event, image, and seu

name: Data Workspace
text: Repository where (meta)data are harvested and then quality controlled, semantically annotated, and combined. Sampling and sequence metadata, omics processing results, and image metadata are included here

name: Documentation
text: ARMS-MBON documentation and templates for labels, observations, and image spreadsheets

name: Data release 001
text: Species identifications, sampling event metdata, image metadata for the first ARMS-MBON dataset submitted to EurOBIS (species observations of the COI marker gene; 2018-2020)

name: Analysis release 001
text: Species identifications and processed sequences from the PEMA analysis of the first ARMS-MBON dataset submitted to EurOBIS (species observations of the COI marker gene; 2018-2020)
